title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: As people need to know everyday what btc price then why there is no screens on streets bars coffee shops stores gas stations or financial district buildings wall s the big screens with top coinmarketcap prices or at least btc price as many people want to know what is the btc price.We should have everywhere the big screens with live prices for sure !!

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on August 13, 2022, 04:28:38 PMas many people want to know what is the btc price.There was a clock tower near where I lived for three years, never looked at it once and just relied on the bell (every quarter hour) or looked at my watch - maybe this is what you should do. The same would go for btc price; whose price are you going to quote petrol stations quote their own a lot of the time, will that be what you'd expect for crypto?

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: Maybe you can submit it to the relevant agency, so that you can display the bitcoin price at any time.Like banks that only display Fiat prices, and some other public places don't display any prices (except the price of the product).It's a matter of regulation everywhere. Don't expect a bitcoin price if bitcoin regulation is only a commodity or crypto asset that is illegal in some countries.But try to start by showing the updated bitcoin price for 24 hours at home or where you work, it's a great small step to set an example.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on August 13, 2022, 04:28:38 PMAs people need to know everyday what btc price then why there is no screens on streets bars coffee shops stores gas stations or financial district buildings wall s the big screens with top coinmarketcap prices or at least btc price as many people want to know what is the btc price.We should have everywhere the big screens with live prices for sure !!I know of a business center in my area that has a monitor (not really a big one but very ok) that shows the top crypto-currency and real time price index, it’s a gradual process I don’t expect Crypto-currency prices to be placed on billboard yet but with efforts such as individual efforts in no distance time we would be getting to see the crypto-currency ecosystem up on giant bill board across big cities of the world.

comments.author: |MINER|
comments.body: I didn't really understand what purpose you were really conveying by doing this. If you want to spread awareness about Bitcoin or introduce people to it then maybe that's fine. Otherwise, I think most of the professional traders are doing analysis and trading at home with a cold head, and in this case, if he is a short-term trader, then maybe he uses the bot option more. I would describe it as , it is good if done and if not then no problem.

comments.body: Quote from: taufik123 on August 13, 2022, 04:37:21 PMMaybe you can submit it to the relevant agency, so that you can display the bitcoin price at any time.Like banks that only display Fiat prices, and some other public places don't display any prices (except the price of the product).It's a matter of regulation everywhere. Don't expect a bitcoin price if bitcoin regulation is only a commodity or crypto asset that is illegal in some countries.But try to start by showing the updated bitcoin price for 24 hours at home or where you work, it's a great small step to set an example.Now the problem is the regulation in each region is different because most bitcoins are still illegal and are only commodity assets so to display bitcoin prices to the public then I guess that is not the case because it will have problems.But I think now that they know the bitcoin price every day, they continue to hold their cellphone and make the bitcoin price widget on their cellphone normal, so they know the bitcoin price at all times.
